service.title: HTTP Extensions for Distributed Authoring - WEBDAV
service.documentation: This document specifies a set of methods, headers, and content-types ancillary to HTTP/1.1 for the management of resource properties, creation and management of resource collections, namespace manipulation, and resource locking (collision avoidance).

http-header.documentation: The Status-URI response header may be used with the 102 (Processing) status code to inform the client as to the status of a method.
